slides.title: bla bla
slides.copy:
In 5 Simple steps you will have created an account and profile on getGround.

This means you will be ready to design your company and proceed to investing in property.

slides.title: One location
slides.copy: In one easy to use location. You will be able to manage your property, add services and view your portfolio.

slides.title: Secure process
slides.copy:
To verify you we will need you to take a photo of yourself, your passport and a proof of address

Don't worry, if you don't have your documents with you right now, you can skip this step and come back to it later.

slides.title: Fast and efficient
slides.copy:
Setting up a company has never been simpler and quicker.

Get started by creating your account now.
